short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Working with multiple monday.com accounts was never so easy!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now you can work with multiple monday accounts without changing between tabs.

You can review pulses information, change column values, send new updates and replies, all from one place!

PulseOverview will do all the job whenever you click on a link to a pulse or post of one of the boards added to the extension settings.

Compatible Columns:
* Status
* Text
* Link

Note: In order to edit values you may need proper permissions in the board/columns through your API token.
